html.p: You take 3 Gold Pieces from the bodies of the cloaked men and are just about to take a piece of paper from the inside pocket of one of them when the door is broken down and the landlord, accompanied by two militiamen, rushes in. You've just been discovered in a room with four dead bodies, apparently looting one of them! If you decide to give yourself up, click here. If you prefer to jump out of the window, click here.
